alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 1:17AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT FORREST...SOUTHERN LAMAR AND SOUTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CST... At 117 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Ovett to near Baxterville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hattiesburg, Petal, West Hattiesburg, Purvis, Lumberton, Oak Grove, Baxterville, Ovett, Brooklyn, McLaurin, Rock Hill, Pine Ridge, Sunrise, Macedonia, and Corinth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
